ing: 2 tablespoons butter, or more to taste
1/2 head cabbage, cored and cut into 1/4-inch slices
des: "Braised cabbage is a tasty side dish with any meal."
ins: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Cook and stir cabbage and onion until onions are translucent, about 5 minutes. Pour in water; add vinegar, sugar, caraway seeds, and salt. Reduce heat to low and cook, stirring occasionally, until cabbage is tender, 20 to 25 minutes.
